title: Marsha de Cordova – 2022 Comments After Andrew Western Wins Stretford and Urmston By-Election for Labour
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Marsha de Cordova, the Labour MP for Battersea, on Twitter on 16 December 2022.
content:
Congratulations to Andrew Western for his by-election victory in Stretford and Urmston.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

The storming victory for Labour in the constituency is yet more evidence that people are crying out for political change! I look forward to working together in Parliament.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
